LanguageData.LandingZone_BestSitesToggleTooltip: Highlight the highest-scoring landing tiles based on your current filters.
LanguageData.LandingZone_CommunityPresetsPlaceholder:
Share your perfect landing site presets!

Export your custom presets using the button below, then share your token on the Steam Workshop or RimWorld forums.

Community-curated presets coming soon!
LanguageData.LandingZone_RevertTooltip: Reset this preset to its original state
LanguageData.LandingZone_LoadedPresetForEditing: Loaded '{0}' into Advanced mode for editing
LanguageData.LandingZone_LoadPresetTooltip: Load this preset into Advanced mode for customization
LanguageData.LandingZone_PresetTooltipAction: Click to apply this preset.\nRemix: Load into Advanced mode for editing.
LanguageData.LandingZone_PresetNameExists: Preset name '{0}' already exists. Please choose a different name.
LanguageData.LandingZone_ModeHint: Preset Hub: Quick starts | Guided Builder: Goal-based wizard | Advanced: Full control
LanguageData.LandingZone_PriorityInstructions: Select 1-4 goals in priority order. Priority 1 = Critical filters, Priority 2-4 = Preferred filters.
LanguageData.LandingZone_SelectPriorityPrompt: Select at least Priority 1 to see recommendations.
LanguageData.LandingZone_AppliedToAdvanced: Applied priority-based filters to Advanced mode
LanguageData.LandingZone_CopiedToAdvanced: Simple mode settings copied to Advanced mode
LanguageData.LandingZone_CopiedToSimple: Advanced mode settings copied to Simple mode
LanguageData.LandingZone_PriorityQuestion: What's your priority for this colony?
LanguageData.LandingZone_LoadingAdvanced: Opening Advanced mode for custom feature selection...
LanguageData.LandingZone_FarmingDesc: Long growing season, fertile soil, consistent rainfall
LanguageData.LandingZone_MixedDesc: Balance of farming, hunting, and fishing
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalLoadedForEditing: Loaded '{0}' filters into Advanced mode for editing
LanguageData.LandingZone_Filter_ResourceModifiers_Sub: MineralRich = more ore veins on tile; Fertile = better soil quality
LanguageData.LandingZone_StoneScrollHint: ({0} stone types - scroll to see all)
LanguageData.LandingZone_Filter_MineableOres_Subtitle: Distinct from 'MineralRich' mutator - these are specific ore types.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Filter_MineableOres_Note: Note: Tiles have only ONE mineable ore type (Gold OR Silver OR Uranium, etc.)
LanguageData.LandingZone_Filter_ResultLimit_Title: Number of top-scored tiles to return from search
LanguageData.LandingZone_Filter_CriticalAdaptive_Subt: Stage A uses intelligent k-of-n fallback to keep candidate count reasonable.
Example: 6 criticals ‚Üí tries 6/6, 5/6, 4/6... until 1,000-10,000 candidates found.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_Runtime: Your search has been running for {0:F1} seconds.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_CurrentSettings: Current settings: Chunk size = {0}, Max candidates = {1}
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_InfoLine1: Large worlds or complex filters can cause longer search times.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_InfoLine2: You can continue searching, or try these optional optimizations:
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_Opt1: ‚Ä¢ Reduce chunk size ‚Üí faster UI updates (slightly slower overall search)
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_Opt2: ‚Ä¢ Lower max candidates ‚Üí fewer tiles processed in Stage B
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_Opt3: ‚Ä¢ Apply Safe profile ‚Üí conservative settings for slow machines
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_QuickActions: Optional Quick Actions (or close to continue):
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_ChunkApplied: Chunk size reduced to 250. Restart search for changes to take effect.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_ChunkAlready: Chunk size already at 250 or lower
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_MaxApplied: Max candidates set to Conservative (25k). Restart search for changes to take effect.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_ProfileApplied: Performance profile set to Safe. Restart search for changes to take effect.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_CloseContinue: Close this dialog to continue searching with current settings.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Perf_NoChanges: No changes required - this is just a performance tip.
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_CompareMutators_Mes: [DEV] Logged mutator coverage diff to Player.log
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_DumpTopResults_Desc: Shows tile ID, score, biome, features, and filter match breakdown
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_DumpOres_Desc: Lists all ore defNames detected from DefDatabase (vanilla + mods)
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_MiniSnapshot_Desc: Small text snapshot (biomes, rivers/roads, first 200 tiles)
LanguageData.LandingZone_NoBookmarksYet:
No bookmarks yet.

Click the star icon in the action bar to add bookmarks,
or use the 'BM' button in the Results window.
LanguageData.LandingZone_DeletePresetConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete '{0}'?
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTooltip: Developer tools: logging, cache dump, performance test
LanguageData.LandingZone_SearchTooltip: Search for best landing sites using {0} mode filters
LanguageData.LandingZone_TabGeographyTooltip: Hilliness, coastal access, movement difficulty, swampiness
LanguageData.LandingZone_TabResourcesTooltip: Stones, forageability, plant/animal density, fish, grazing
LanguageData.LandingZone_HighlyRestrictiveWarning: ‚ö† Highly restrictive - results may be limited.
LanguageData.LandingZone_EstimateUnavailable: (Tile count estimate unavailable for these filter types)
LanguageData.LandingZone_TipAdjustFilters: Tip: Adjust filters in left panel to refine your search
LanguageData.LandingZone_HighlightsTooltip: Toggle colored markers on the world map showing top-scoring tiles from your search results
LanguageData.LandingZone_NoSearchData: No active match data. Run a search to populate this list.
LanguageData.LandingZone_WaitingForSearch: Once LandingZone finishes a search the ranked sites will appear here.
LanguageData.LandingZone_NoMatchesExplanation: Your requirements are too strict for this world. No tiles match all your MustHave filters.\n\nTry a relaxed search to find the closest alternatives.
LanguageData.LandingZone_TryRelaxedSearchTooltip: Converts MustHave gates to Priority scoring.\nResults will show the best available tiles\neven if they don't meet all requirements.
LanguageData.LandingZone_RelaxedSearchBanner: [RELAXED] These results may not meet all your original requirements. Low scores indicate missing MustHave filters.
LanguageData.LandingZone_AlreadyBookmarked: {0} tile(s) already bookmarked or capacity reached
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictRiverAnd: Impossible: {0} river types with AND (tiles have max 1 river)
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictRiverSuggestion: Switch to OR operator or keep only 1 Critical river type
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictStoneAnd: Impossible requirement: {0} stones with AND operator
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictStoneSuggestion: Switch to OR operator (tiles only have 1 ore type)
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictGrowingTemp: Contradictory: High growing days require warm temperatures
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictGrowingTempSuggestio: Increase minimum temperature or decrease growing days requirement
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictHighRainfall: High rainfall requirement limits biome options
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictHighRainfallSuggesti: Desert and arid biomes will be excluded
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictVeryRestrictive: Very restrictive config: Only ~{0} tiles estimated ({1} critical filters)
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictVeryRestrictiveSugge: Relax some Critical‚ÜíPreferred, use Fallback Tiers, or widen ranges
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictRestrictive: Restrictive config: Only ~{0} tiles estimated ({1} critical filters)
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictRestrictiveSuggestio: Consider relaxing some Critical filters to Preferred if search yields few results
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictManyCriticals: {0} Critical filters may be too restrictive
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictManyCriticalsSuggest: Consider changing some Critical filters to Preferred for more results
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictUltraRareAnd: Ultra-rare AND: {0} ultra-rare features (each <0.1% of tiles)
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictUltraRareAndSuggesti: Switch to OR operator or relax some to Preferred importance
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictManyFeaturesAnd: {0} Critical features with AND may produce very few results
LanguageData.LandingZone_ConflictManyFeaturesAndSugge: Switch to OR operator or reduce Critical feature count
LanguageData.LandingZone_OperatorOrTooltip: OR operator: Tiles need AT LEAST ONE of the {0} selected {1}.\n\nMore flexible - typically produces more results.
LanguageData.LandingZone_OperatorAndTooltip: AND operator: Tiles need ALL {0} selected {1}.\n\nVery restrictive - may produce few or zero results.
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalClimateComfortDesc: Find a pleasant, moderate climate with comfortable temperatures year-round
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalResourceWealthDesc: Maximize available resources: minerals, plants, animals, and materials
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalDefensibilityDesc: Prioritize defensive terrain: mountains, caves, cliffs, and natural barriers
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalFoodProductionDesc: Optimize for food security through farming, hunting, or fishing
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalPowerGenerationDesc: Access to renewable energy: geothermal, wind, solar, or hydroelectric
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalTradeAccessDesc: Coastal or road access for trading and visitor traffic
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalChallengeRarityDesc: Find ultra-rare map features for challenging or unique gameplay
LanguageData.LandingZone_GoalSpecificFeatureDesc: Search for specific map features, biomes, or conditions
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterTemp10to25Desc: Comfortable year-round temperatures (no extreme heat or cold)
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterRainfall600to1400Desc: Moderate rainfall (not too dry, not swampy)
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterGrowingDays30to60Desc: Long growing season for year-round crops
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterHighForageDesc: Abundant wild plants for foraging and medicine
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterHighAnimalDensityDesc: Plenty of wildlife for hunting and taming
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterHighPlantDensityDesc: Dense vegetation for wood and materials
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterCoastalOrRoadsDesc: Trade caravans and ships can reach you
LanguageData.LandingZone_FilterUltraRareFeaturesDesc: Extremely rare map features (may return 0 results)
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_DevModeOnly: Dev Mode only - hidden in release builds
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_DumpStarted: [LandingZone] Dumping FULL world cache (this may take a while)...
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_DumpCompleted: [LandingZone] Full world cache dump started. Check {0} for LandingZone_FullCache_[timestamp].txt
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_DumpDescription: Dumps all ~295k tiles with full property reflection.
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_PerfTestDescription: Benchmarks filter performance on current world.
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_VerboseTip: Tip: Set logging to Verbose for detailed match score breakdowns in Player.log.
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_WorldNullError: [LandingZone] WorldDataDumper: World or grid is null
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_PerfTestCheap: PerformanceTest: {0} is cheap - no optimization needed
LanguageData.LandingZone_DevTools_PerfTestComplete: [LandingZone] Performance Test: Complete. Check results above.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_balanced_Description: Perfect for new players - year-round growing, defensible terrain, water access, trade routes. Core-friendly, enhanced with DLC.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_elysian_Description: The easiest RimWorld experience - perfect climate, ideal biome, abundant resources, stacked +10 quality mutators. God-tier colonist paradise.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_exotic_Description: Hunt for ultra-rare features - Caverns, HotSprings, Oasis, MineralRich. DLC adds ArcheanTrees and lava features. Stack rares for highest scores!
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_exotic_FilterSummary: Ultra-Rare Features | Layered Design | Stacking Bonuses
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_subzero_Description: Extreme cold survival challenge - frozen tundra, ice sheets, barely any growing season. For masochists only.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_scorched_Description: Volcanic nightmare - extreme heat, lava flows, toxic atmosphere. Embrace the fire!
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_desert_oasis_Descript: Water in the wasteland - desert tiles with life-sustaining rivers. Coastal access is a bonus!
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_defense_Description: Natural defensibility - mountains, caves, chokepoints, stone abundance. Build an impenetrable fortress.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_agrarian_Description: Maximum agricultural potential - fertile soil, perfect climate, water abundance, year-round growing. Feed the world.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_agrarian_FilterSummar: 50-60 Grow Days | Fertile | High Rain | Flat
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_power_Description: Maximum power generation - geothermal, hydro, wind, solar. Energy independence through diversified infrastructure.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_bayou_Description: Hot, wet, diseased marshlands - swamps, mud, difficult terrain, overgrown vegetation. Swamp horror survival.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_savannah_Description: Warm grasslands with abundant wildlife, wind, open terrain - perfect for hunting, herding, and wind power.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_aquatic_Description: Maximum water access - coastal tiles with rivers, lakes, headwaters. Fish, trade, and naval supremacy.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_homestead_Description: Move-in ready! Find abandoned settlements and ancient structures with existing buildings to salvage.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_anomaly_Description: Horror experience - underground caves, dramatic mountains, atmospheric fog. Anomaly DLC adds lava, toxicity, and alien terrain for full terror!
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_trade_empire_Descript: Build a trading powerhouse - coastal access for sea routes, roads for caravans, valuable resources. Natural ports boost with Geological Landforms!
LanguageData.LandingZone_Preset_trade_empire_FilterSu: Coastal | Roads | Luxury Ores | Natural Ports
LanguageData.LandingZone_PresetSavedWithOverrides: [LandingZone] Saved user preset '{0}' with {1} quality overrides
LanguageData.LandingZone_ImportTokenInstructions: Paste a preset token below to import a shared preset. Tokens are compact, shareable strings that encode all filter settings.
LanguageData.LandingZone_PresetNameOptional: Preset name (optional - leave blank to keep original):
LanguageData.LandingZone_PresetImportedWithWarnings: Imported preset: {0} ({1} filters skipped - see log)
LanguageData.LandingZone_ImportValidationWarning: Warning: {0} item(s) not found in your game:
LanguageData.LandingZone_ImportValidationNote: These filters will be skipped. Install the required mods/DLC to enable them.
LanguageData.LandingZone_TokenExportedInstructions: Share this token with other players or keep it for backup. It has also been copied to your clipboard.
LanguageData.LandingZone_MutatorNotInWorld: '{0}' not found in this world. May be replaced by a mod.
LanguageData.LandingZone_ImportanceExplanation_Critic:
[CRITICAL] Hard requirement - tiles MUST match this filter.
Used in Apply phase to eliminate non-matching tiles.
LanguageData.LandingZone_ImportanceExplanation_Prefer:
[PREFERRED] Soft preference - tiles are scored higher if they match.
Used in Score phase to rank surviving tiles.
LanguageData.LandingZone_ImportanceExplanation_Ignore: \n\n[IGNORED] Filter is disabled and won't affect results.
LanguageData.LandingZone_MatchDataDumped: Match data dumped to Player.log ({0} results)
LanguageData.LandingZone_MoreMatchesTruncated: ... and {0} more matches (truncated; enable verbose to log all)
LanguageData.LandingZone_FallbackTierManager_NoWorld: Fallback tier manager available when world is loaded
LanguageData.LandingZone_FallbackTierManager_NoCritic: Set filters to Critical importance to see fallback tiers
LanguageData.LandingZone_FallbackTierManager_Instruct: If current strictness is too restrictive, use these preset fallback tiers:
LanguageData.LandingZone_FallbackTierManager_NoAltern: No alternative tiers available (adjust strictness manually if needed)
LanguageData.LandingZone_HeavyFilter_Explanation: One or more "heavy" filters are set to hard gate importance (Must Have / Must NOT Have). Heavy filters require expensive calculations that can significantly slow down searches on large worlds.
LanguageData.LandingZone_HeavyFilter_PerformanceNote: Heavy filters work best as Priority/Preferred where they score the top candidates rather than filter all tiles.
LanguageData.LandingZone_HeavyFilter_DemotedMessage: Demoted {0} heavy filter(s) to Priority importance
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_BucketViewTooltip: Visual bucket-based filter configuration with drag-and-drop and OR grouping
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_ClassicViewTooltip: Traditional tabbed filter list with importance toggles
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_LimitedWarning:
Bucket View is a preview feature with limited filter coverage.

You have {0} active filter(s) that won't be visible or editable in Bucket View:
{1}

These filters will remain active but hidden. Use Classic View for full control.

Switch to Bucket View anyway?
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_SwitchedToClassic: Switched to Classic View: preset includes {0} filter(s) not editable in Bucket View ({1})
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_PaletteHint: Click 'Add' to place a filter in a bucket
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_HeavyFilterWarning: Heavy Filter: This filter requires expensive calculations.\nIf set to Must Have/Must NOT, a warning will be shown before search.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_LegendLine1: Must Have = required to match | Must NOT = disqualifies tile | Priority/Preferred = influences ranking
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_LegendLine2: OR groups: 'any of' | Chips within bucket: AND together
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_BucketInlineHint: Filters AND together; select 2+ and 'Group as OR' for any-of
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_GroupAsOrTooltip: Combine {0} selected filters into an OR group (any match satisfies)
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_UngroupTooltip: Break the OR group back into individual filters
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_ChipDragTooltip: {0}\nDrag to move between buckets | Ctrl/Cmd+Click to multi-select | Right-click to remove
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_HeavyDemoteWarning: '{0}' is a heavy filter. Consider using Priority importance for better performance.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_OrGroup_Tooltip: OR Group: Any of these filters will match\nClick to break apart
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_OrGroup_DragToolti: OR Group: Any filter inside matches\nDrag to move entire group | Right-click to ungroup
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_ClickToUngroup: Click to ungroup back to individual filters
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_AndClickTooltip: Click to select both adjacent filters for OR grouping
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_AddClauseTooltip: Add another clause to this bucket.\nClauses are ORed together: if any clause matches, the tile qualifies.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_RemoveClauseToolti: Remove this clause.\nIf this is the only clause, it will be emptied instead.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_AddOrConditionTool: Add an alternate condition (OR clause).\nTile matches if ANY clause is satisfied.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_ClauseHint: Clauses ORed; items inside ANDed (OR groups allowed)
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_ClearAllConfirm: Are you sure you want to clear all filters from all buckets?
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_SavePresetTooltip: Save current filter configuration as a reusable preset
LanguageData.LandingZone_Workspace_TileEstimateToolti: Estimated number of tiles matching Must Have/Must NOT filters.\nThis is a heuristic - actual results may vary.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_Biomes: Filter by biome type - select allowed biomes
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_Rivers: World tile has river crossing - select types
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_Roads: World tile has road connection - select types
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_WaterAccess: Any water source (ocean, lake, or river)
LanguageData.LandingZone_TooltipDetail_Biomes: Biomes filters world tiles by ecosystem type. Select one or more biomes to limit your search.\n\nBiomes determine available resources, animals, plants, temperature ranges, and overall survival difficulty.
LanguageData.LandingZone_TooltipDetail_Rivers: Rivers filters world tiles by which river TYPES cross them (Creek, Stream, River, Huge River).\n\nUse the popup to select specific river types. This is different from the "River" map feature which affects terrain generation.
LanguageData.LandingZone_TooltipDetail_Roads: Roads filters world tiles by road connections (Dirt Path, Dirt Road, Stone Road, Ancient Asphalt Road/Highway).\n\nTiles with roads provide faster caravan travel and may indicate nearby settlements or trade routes.
LanguageData.LandingZone_TooltipDetail_River: The River map feature (from Geological Landforms) creates river terrain when you land on the tile.\n\nThis is different from "Rivers" which filters by world map river crossings.
LanguageData.LandingZone_TooltipDetail_WaterAccess:
Water Access is a convenience filter that matches tiles with ANY water source:
- Ocean coastline
- Lake coastline
- River crossing

Redundant if Rivers or Coastal is also selected.
LanguageData.LandingZone_TooltipDetail_Coastal: Ocean Coastal filters for tiles that border ocean water. Good for fishing, naval travel, and coastal defenses.
LanguageData.LandingZone_TooltipDetail_CoastalLake: Lake Coastal filters for tiles that border a lake. Provides freshwater access without ocean exposure.
LanguageData.LandingZone_TooltipDetail_Hilliness:
Hilliness determines the terrain elevation:
- Flat: Open plains
- Small Hills: Gentle rolling terrain
- Large Hills: Significant elevation changes
- Mountainous: Steep cliffs and mountains
LanguageData.LandingZone_TooltipDetail_Caves: Caves map feature (from Geological Landforms) generates underground cave systems when you land.\n\nGood for defensible positions and mining.
LanguageData.LandingZone_TooltipDetail_Mountain: Mountain map feature (from Geological Landforms) generates mountainous terrain.\n\nProvides natural defenses and mining opportunities.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_TemperatureAverage: Year-round average temperature.\n\nAffects colonist comfort, crop growth, and energy needs. Most crops need temps between 0-50¬∞C.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_TemperatureMinimum: Coldest temperature reached during winter.\n\nCritical for survival planning - extreme cold requires heating and warm clothing.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_TemperatureMaximum: Hottest temperature reached during summer.\n\nExtreme heat causes heatstroke and affects mood. May require cooling systems.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_Rainfall: Annual precipitation in millimeters.\n\nAffects plant growth, puddle formation, and weather patterns. Desert <600mm, temperate 1000-2000mm.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_GrowingDays: Days per year with temperatures suitable for crop growth (10-42¬∞C).\n\n60 = year-round growing, 30 = limited season, 0 = no outdoor farming possible.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_Pollution: Environmental pollution level (0-1).\n\nHigher values mean toxic terrain, tainted resources, and health hazards. Biotech DLC feature.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_Elevation: Tile height above sea level (0-3100m).\n\nHigher elevation = colder temperatures. Mountains require 1000m+ elevation.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_MovementDifficulty: Terrain penalty for movement (1.0 = normal).\n\nHigher values slow caravans and raiders. Swamps/mountains have higher difficulty.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_Swampiness: How marshy/boggy the terrain is (0-1).\n\nHigh swampiness means more puddles, difficult terrain, and disease risk.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_Forageability: How much food can be foraged from the land (0-1).\n\nHigher = more berries, roots, and edible plants for early survival.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_Grazeable: Whether animals can graze outdoors without hay/kibble.\n\nRequires sufficient plant growth - not available in deserts or ice sheets.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_AnimalDensity: Wildlife density multiplier.\n\nHigher = more hunting opportunities and animal attacks. Deserts are low, forests are high.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_PlantDensity: Vegetation density (0-1.3).\n\nAffects wood availability, foraging, and wildfire spread.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_FishPopulation: Fish spawn rate for fishing (0-900).\n\nRequires water access. Higher = more fishing opportunities. Ocean/large rivers are best.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Tooltip_Landmark: World map landmark features (ruins, structures).\n\nProvides interesting exploration opportunities and potential loot.
LanguageData.LandingZone_NoMatchesRunSearch: No matches yet - run a search first
LanguageData.LandingZone_AddBookmark: Bookmark this tile for later reference
LanguageData.LandingZone_SelectTileToBookmark: Select a tile to bookmark it
LanguageData.LandingZone_NoMatchesClickSearch: No matches yet - click Search to find settlements
LanguageData.LandingZone_ClearAllBookmarksConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all bookmarks? This cannot be undone.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Hilliness_AllSelected: Hilliness filter requires at least one type to be excluded. Click the chip to deselect unwanted types.
LanguageData.LandingZone_DefaultPresetIndicator: Default preset - automatically applied when loading a new world
LanguageData.LandingZone_Settings_ChallengeModeDesc: Swaps good/bad ratings - harsh environments score higher.
LanguageData.LandingZone_Settings_ConfigureMutatorsDe: Customize how each mutator affects tile quality scores.
LanguageData.LandingZone_MutatorDialog_Subtitle: Customize how each mutator affects tile quality. Drag sliders or click values.
LanguageData.LandingZone_MutatorDialog_ResetAllConfir: All mutator ratings reset to defaults.
